per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=dec_med = pow (0.9, 30/fps);
per_frame_25=dec_slow = pow (0.99, 30/fps);
per_frame_26=beat = max (max (bass, mid), treb); 
per_frame_27=avg = avg*dec_slow + beat*(1-dec_slow);
per_frame_28=is_beat = above(beat, .5+avg+peak) * above (time, t0+.2);
per_frame_29=t0 = is_beat*time + (1-is_beat)*t0;
per_frame_30=peak = is_beat * beat + (1-is_beat)*peak*dec_med;
per_frame_31=index = (index + is_beat) %4;
per_frame_32=index2 = (index2 + is_beat*bnot(index))%4;
per_frame_33=index3 = (index3 + is_beat*bnot(index)*bnot(index2))%3;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=q20 = avg;
per_frame_37=q21 = beat;
per_frame_38=q22 = max(peak,4);
per_frame_39=q23 = index;
per_frame_40=q24 = is_beat;
per_frame_41=q26 = max(bass + mid + treb,3);
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=movez = movez + .1*(1+.3*q26)*30/fps;
per_frame_44=q30 = movez;
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=k1 =  is_beat*equal(index,0);
per_frame_47=p1 =  k1*(p1+1) + (1-k1)*p1;
per_frame_48=p2 = dec_med * p2+ (1-dec_med)*p1;
per_frame_49=p3 = dec_med * p3+ (1-dec_med)*p2;
per_frame_50=rott = p3*3.1416/2;
per_frame_51=
per_frame_52=q1 = cos(rott);
per_frame_53=q2 = sin(rott);
per_frame_54=q3 = -q2;
per_frame_55=q4 = q1;
per_frame_56=
per_frame_57=
per_frame_58=str = str * dec_slow + (1-dec_slow) * index3;
per_frame_59=q27 = 4 - str;
per_frame_60=
per_frame_61=mv_a = equal(index2,2)*bnot(index)*.5;
per_frame_62=
per_frame_63=rot1 = dec_med * rot1 + (1-dec_med) * bnot(index2) ;
per_frame_64=q28 = rot1;
per_frame_65=
per_frame_66=copy = copy * dec_slow + (1-dec_slow)*index3;
per_frame_67=q29 = .3*copy;
per_frame_68=
per_frame_69=
per_pixel_1=dx = 0.04*q28;
per_pixel_2=rot = .06*q2;
per_pixel_3=zoom = .96 + .1*sin(time/7);
per_pixel_4=//zoom = 1.04;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv_orig-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`float z = 6*q2*length(uv1) ;
warp_12=`float2 d = -normalize(1/uv1);
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(q1*z+q30)*d,-8,8);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`if (q28 ==1) {rs *= cos(uv1.yx*3*q27) ;}
warp_17=`
warp_18=`uv += rs/40;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`uv6 = .5*float2(rad, length(uv1));
warp_21=`
warp_22=`//uv6 = mul(uv6,float2x2(_qa));
warp_23=`
warp_24=`mus = saturate(.08/(sqrt(uv6.y-q10)));
warp_25=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_26=`                      ((uv6.xyy*q27
warp_27=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_28=`                      ).xyz*
warp_29=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_30=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_31=`                     );
warp_32=`if(mus.x> q21*q13         && mus.x<= q24*q11        )mus.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_33=`if(mus.y> q22*q11         && mus.y<= q25*q12        )mus.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_34=`if(mus.z> q23*q12         && mus.z<= q26*q13        )mus.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_35=`mus *= float3 (1,.84,.5);
warp_36=`
warp_37=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_38=`
warp_39=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_40=`
warp_41=`float3 ret1 = crisp - blur*.04 + .05*mus;
warp_42=`ret = ret1 * .98 -  .006;
warp_43=`
warp_44=`
warp_45=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uv1 = (uv-0.5)*aspect.xy;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`float rad2 = length(uv1) + .1;
comp_6=`float rad1 = .1/rad2 ;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`float2 uv2 = float2 (ang/3.14, q27*rad1);
comp_9=`uv2.y = uv2.y  +.1*q30;
comp_10=`uv2.x = uv2.x  +.2*time;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`float2 uv3 = float2 (ang/3.14, 4*rad1);
comp_13=`uv3.y = uv3.y  -.1*q30;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`
comp_16=`float3 crisp = 2*GetPixel(uv2) + GetPixel(uv3);
comp_17=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_18=`                      ((uv3.xyy*q28
comp_19=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_20=`                      ).xyz*
comp_21=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_22=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_23=`                     );
comp_24=`if(crisp.x> q26*q13         && crisp.x<= q23*q11        )crisp.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_25=`if(crisp.y> q25*q11         && crisp.y<= q22*q12        )crisp.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_26=`if(crisp.z> q24*q12         && crisp.z<= q21*q13        )crisp.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_27=`crisp = max(crisp,2*GetBlur2(frac(uv2)) + GetBlur2(frac(uv3)));
comp_28=`
comp_29=`float3 lay1 = float3 (0,0,1)*uv.y*pow(1-rad,8);
comp_30=`
comp_31=`crisp = 3*crisp * pow(rad,1);
comp_32=`float mask = saturate(1-4*rad);
comp_33=`
comp_34=`ret = crisp + lay1*mask + mask * 2*GetBlur1(uv);
comp_35=`
comp_36=`}
